original_text: The next day a harmful spirit from God rushed upon Saul, and he raved within his house while David was playing the lyre, as he did day by day. Saul had his spear in his hand.
korean_text: 그 이튿날 하나님께서 부리시는 악령이 사울에게 힘 있게 내리매 그가 집 안에서 정신 없이 떠들어대므로 다윗이 평일과 같이 손으로 수금을 타는데 그 때에 사울의 손에 창이 있는지라

sentences.original_text: a harmful spirit from God rushed upon Saul
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께로부터 온 해로운 영이 사울에게 들이닥쳤고

sentences.original_text: and he raved within his house
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기 집 안에서 소리치며 날뛰었고

sentences.original_text: while David was playing the lyre
as he did day by day
Saul had his spear in his hand
